item.title: Senior Product Designer – Accessible Platforms
item.description:
• Led the redesign of a core onboarding flow, increasing successful completion by an estimated 20% while reducing support tickets related to account setup.
  • Partnered with engineers to align components with WCAG 2.1 AA, improving color contrast, focus handling, and keyboard navigation across key flows.
  • Introduced a design-system first workflow, reducing one‑off UI debt and bringing down implementation time for new screens.
